ifleetPage.description: Complete fleet management system for public transport
ifleetPage.detailedDescription: Integrated solution including automatic passenger counting, real-time video monitoring, GPS tracking, and advanced reporting for transport operations optimization.

features.gpsTrackingDesc: Precise tracking of each vehicle's position with real-time updates and complete route history.
features.videoMonitoringDesc: Integrated video surveillance system for passenger safety and driver protection, with cloud storage and remote access.
features.passengerCountingDesc: Advanced sensors for precise passenger counting at each station, with automatic reporting and statistical analysis.
features.scheduleComplianceDesc: Real-time monitoring of schedule adherence, automatic alerts for delays, and route optimization for maximum efficiency.
features.robustCobDesc: Latest-generation industrial hardware, resistant to vibrations and extreme temperatures, with 4G/WiFi/Bluetooth connectivity.
features.reportingDesc: Complete dashboard with detailed reports, operational KPIs, and predictive analytics for fleet optimization.

optifarePage.description: Advanced e-ticketing system for modern public transport
optifarePage.detailedDescription: Comprehensive solution for contactless payments, smart cards, and passenger validation with real-time reporting.

features.contactlessPaymentDesc: Accept Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay, and Google Pay for seamless passenger experience.
features.smartCardsDesc: Support for electronic subscriptions and tickets with secure validation.
features.qrCodesDesc: 1D and 2D barcode scanning for paper and mobile tickets.
features.realTimeReportingDesc: Instant transaction data and revenue analytics for operators.
features.robustHardwareDesc: Industrial-grade E-Check validators designed for harsh public transport environments.
features.passengerInterfaceDesc: Clear visual and audio feedback for successful validation and payment confirmation.

exactPage.description: Intelligent passenger information system with real-time route planner
exactPage.detailedDescription: Interior and exterior LED displays, voice announcements, estimated arrival time, and line connections. Complete experience for informed travelers.

features.routePlanningDesc: Dynamic route calculation based on current traffic and service disruptions.
features.ledDisplaysDesc: High-visibility interior and exterior displays showing next stops, connections, and service information.
features.voiceAnnouncementsDesc: Automatic multilingual announcements for stops, connections, and service updates.
features.etaDesc: Real-time arrival predictions at each station based on current traffic conditions.
features.stationDisplaysDesc: Real-time information displays at stops showing arrivals, departures, and delays.
features.passengerFeedDesc: Continuous transmission of useful information: routes, schedules, connections, and special announcements.

displayTypes.title: Display Types
displayTypes.interiorDesc: Next stop, route information, and connection details for passengers inside the vehicle.
displayTypes.exteriorDesc: Route number, destination, and service information visible from outside the vehicle.
displayTypes.stationsDesc: Real-time arrival and departure information at public transport stops.
displayTypes.feedDesc: Continuous transmission of useful information: routes, schedules, connections, and special announcements.
displayTypes.publicInfoDesc: Integration with emergency alert systems for special situations or events.
displayTypes.advertisingDesc: Ability to display advertising messages between travel information.
